comment:
* The Security Policy of Thread Operational Dataset which provides an administrator with a way
     * to enable or disable certain security related behaviors.

variables.name: DEFAULT_ROTATION_TIME_HOURS
variables.comment: The default Rotation Time in hours.

variables.name: LENGTH_MIN_SECURITY_POLICY_FLAGS
variables.comment: The minimum length of Security Policy flags in bytes.

variables.name: LENGTH_SECURITY_POLICY_ROTATION_TIME
variables.comment: The length of Rotation Time TLV value in bytes.

methods.name: public static SecurityPolicy fromTlvValue(byte[] encodedSecurityPolicy)
methods.comment:
* Creates a new {@link SecurityPolicy} object from the Security Policy TLV value.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public byte[] toTlvValue()
methods.comment:
* Converts this {@link SecurityPolicy} object to Security Policy TLV value.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public int getRotationTimeHours()
methods.comment: Returns the Security Policy Rotation Time in hours.

methods.name: public byte[] getFlags()
methods.comment: Returns 1 byte flags for Thread 1.1 or 2 bytes flags for Thread 1.2.
